SELECT
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) AS payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type_desc')AS VARCHAR(15)) AS payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='0x0a'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc varchar(max)1
    )As payment

--OpenJson
SELECT
    payment_type,description
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'        
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc varchar(max)1
    )As payment
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    With(
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        description varchar(20) '$.payment_type_desc'
    )
/*--------------------------------
Reading JSON Array data
-------------------------------*/
SELECT
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) AS payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type_desc[0].value')AS VARCHAR(15)) AS payment_type_desc_0,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type_desc[1].value')AS VARCHAR(15)) AS payment_type_desc_1
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='0x0a'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc varchar(max)1
    )As payment

--Reading json array using OPENJSON()
SELECT
    payment_type,payment_type_desc_value
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='0x0a'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc varchar(max)1
    )As payment
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(max) AS JSON
    )
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc) 
    WITH(
        sub_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc_value VARCHAR(20) '$.value'
    )
